```{r setup}

library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

##Basic statistics

```{r}
lipidomics %>%
  group_by(metabolite) %>%
  summarise(across( # given these columns, do this action
    value,
    list( # give it a list, if you want it to have a name
      mean = mean,
      sd = sd
    )
  )) %>%
  mutate(across(
    where(is.numeric),
    ~ round(.x, digits = 1) # to round off for all columns at once
  ))
```

#Make function

```{r}
descriptive_stats <- function(data) {
  data %>% 
    dplyr::group_by(metabolite) %>% 
    dplyr::summarise(dplyr::across(
        value,
        base::list(
            mean=mean,
            sd=sd
        )
    )) %>% 
        dplyr::mutate(dplyr::across(
        tidyselect::where(is.numeric),
        ~base::round(.x, digits=1)
        ))
}
```
